programme.title: College Basketball
programme.sub-title: ACC Tournament: North Carolina vs. Virginia
programme.desc: The No. 7 Tar Heels come up against the No. 2 Cavaliers in an ACC Tournament quarterfinal. Caleb Love poured in 22 points as North Carolina cruised past Boston College 85-61 in the second round. Virginia split two regular-season meetings with UNC.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.sub-title: ACC Tournament: NC State vs. Clemson
programme.desc: The No. 3 Tigers (22-9) meet the No. 6 Wolfpack (23-9) in the ACC Tournament quarterfinals. Clemson has won five straight meetings, including two this season by a combined 39 points. NC State eliminated No. 11 Virginia Tech 97-77 in the second round.
